scripts.test:
echo 'This is a placeholder for agent verification tests. To run these tests, an external framework would:' && \
            echo '1. Programmatically invoke the Gemini CLI (or the underlying API of the agent).' && \
            echo '2. Pass prompts and context (e.g., the content of steering/guidelines-verification-protocol.md).' && \
            echo '3. Capture the agent's standard output.' && \
            echo '4. Use a testing library (like Jest or Mocha) to assert that the captured output matches expected responses.' && \
            echo 'Currently, no automated tests are configured to run here.' && exit 0
